About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Dr Dong Wang is a statistician in DOC, New Zealand. He has a PhD in Machine Learning and is an Artificial Intelligence developer, researcher, practitioner as well as an Open Source Software developer, with over 20 years working for multiple high profile consultancy companies, universities and government bodies

City university of Hong Kong

Research Associate (2006-09)

Build Machine learning models (Neural netwoks, Swarm intelligence, Support vector machine, Random forests, Bayesian neural networks etc.) to forecast air pollution time series

Lincoln University

Quantitative Modeller (2009-12)

Build individual based models to simulate species mating behaviors

NIWA, New Zealand

Quantitative Modeller (2012-17)

Geospatial modelling with A.I. Predict the species numbers in ocean
Land use regression models for mapping air pollution hotspots, what if analyses

DOC, New Zealand

Statistician/Data Scientist (2017-)

Sensitivity Analyses on complex system
Web Scraping using Python on Survey Monkey
R Shiny dashborad
Business report generating
Use R and PowerBI to manage data in Azure SQL Database
